long_description: Are you climbing a glaciated peak this summer? The Grivel G-10 New-Classic crampons are ideal for general mountaineering and will fit most styles of boots, from leather to synthetic to plastic. Chromoly steel construction is strong and durable; semirigid design is suitable for use with leather, synthetic or plastic mountaineering boots. Classic binding system features a single strap closure that's simple to use; toe and heel pieces wrap around your boots for a solid and secure fit. 10-point crampons are ideal for glacier travel or ski touring. Grivel G-10 New-Classic crampons have removable Antibott shields to prevent unsafe snow buildup beneath the crampons; Antibotts stay flexible in cold temperatures.
short_description: Are you climbing a glaciated peak this summer? The Grivel G-10 New-Classic crampons are ideal for general mountaineering and will fit most styles of boots, from leather to synthetic to plastic.
